description: Retrieves details of a specific bill scenario.

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the bill scenario to retrieve.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the retrieved bill scenario.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the retrieved bill scenario.

nested_items.name: billInterval
nested_items.description: The time period covered by the bill scenario.

nested_items.name: start
nested_items.description: The start date and time of the interval.

nested_items.name: end
nested_items.description: The end date and time of the interval.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current status of the bill scenario.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the bill scenario was created.

nested_items.name: expiresAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the bill scenario will expire.

nested_items.name: failureMessage
nested_items.description: An error message if the bill scenario retrieval failed.
